attributes.action: Get the word 'poggers' in the Oxford dictionary
attributes.additional_details: To help contact Oxford dictionarys and raise awareness for this beautiful word
attributes.background: Get the word in the Oxford dictionary

rejection.details:
This is a matter for Oxford University Press, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can submit words you would like to be added to the Oxford English Dictionary, along with the evidence to back up your submission, here: https://public.oed.com/contribute-to-the-oed/submission-form/.
